thread.title: BRIEF-Independent Bank Announces Regulatory Approvals To Acquire Traverse City State Bank

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Independent Bank Announces Regulatory Approvals To Acquire Traverse City State Bank

organizations.name: brief-independent bank announces regulatory approvals to acquire traverse city state bank

text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Independent Bank Corp:
* INDEPENDENT BANK CORPORATION ANNOUNCES REGULATORY APPROVALS TO ACQUIRE TRAVERSE CITY STATE BANK
* INDEPENDENT BANK - ‍MEETING OF TCSB SHAREHOLDERS HAS BEEN SCHEDULED FOR MARCH 14 TO CONSIDER, VOTE UPON PROPOSAL TO APPROVE MERGER BETWEEN IBCP, TCSB​
* INDEPENDENT BANK CORP - ‍MERGER OF CO AND TCSB BANCORP IS CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO BE EFFECTIVE ON APR. 1, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
